website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo A10 Tablet is a budget-friendly choice for watching videos on a large-screen Android tablet.

customer_reviews.title: Solid tablet from Lenovo
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet; use it for work. Not a powerhouse but no slouch either. Pros: -Lightweight -Good build -Battery life -Micro SD card slot Neutral: -Screen Resolution -Lenovo launcher -Processor speed -1 GB Ram Cons: -Time to charge -Lack of accessories -No HDMI out The cons, while not show-stoppers, are annoying. The battery life is as advertised, but time to charge in my opinion is excessive. Charging times of 5 hours are not unheard of in my experience with this tablet. Also, very few accessories exist for this tablet, even from the OEM Lenovo. But....I still like this tablet as does perform well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I expected from Lenovo. Very easy to use and a very good price. If this is your first tablet purchase, I would recommend this unit. I purchased 32 GB; but I think that 16 would be adequate if this is your first tablet. One of the features that is also great to consider when selecting a tablet is the sound if you surf u-tube a lot or have a lot of music stored on the tablet. The speakers are mounted on each side which makes for great quality. le
customer_reviews.author: Lwayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet and Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger tablet than my Nexus 7 and one that had a built in GPS chip. The Idea Tab A10-70 was perfect. It has functioned perfectly and I have not had any problems such as those mentioned in these reviews and the Lenovo site. Very happy with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Cheap Price
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought it new in the box, I had to do a lot of updates and then it kept turning off after I unplugged it from the charger when it was fullycharged. I ended up doing a quick factory reset and it has been working very well for a few months now. It is fun for the cheap price, display is beautiful, and the battery life is awesome! The only thing I use it for is to play games and watch YouTube. It is a wonderful little device.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The tablet looks very good. I like the size
customer_reviews.text: The tablet keeps on rebooting by itself every time when I turned it on. Sometimes it happens after 15 minutes of use; sometimes only a few minutes after being turned on. Then it will go into an endless rebooting circle. It appears that there may be a firmware problem. The tablet looks very good. I like the size, weight and the touch. But the self-rebooting problem makes it completely useless. I am returning it to Amazon as a defective product ...
customer_reviews.author: souwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase. I used my sister's ipad and it was a good tablet. This tablet is just as good. I love it. The sound quality is great. The video quality is great. The camera quality is decent. The performance is great. The accessories I can get for it has a lot of options. It has already been put under a lot of abuse and it's still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: WonderlandTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Across the board excellent for the price - leaves competition in the dust.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. I'm in IT for many years and have tested and used over 20 different model tablets. The price to performance on this particular unit is a complete blowout. For the price anyone would be nuts to nitpick. Solid, outstanding standby battery conservation, great screen, performance and wifi.
customer_reviews.author: THX1138

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple of months now and have not had any issues. Battery life has been excellent and picture quality and audio has been good. I also bought the Lenovo Bluetooth Keyboard model LBK 500 and the Technet bluetooth mouse model BM306. Both work great even when I use them both at the same time. The camera leaves a little to be desired quality wise but if you can live that I don't think you can go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JJRider

customer_reviews.title: ... using the tablet for 2 weeks and I'm very happy with the tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the tablet for 2 weeks and I'm very happy with the tablet. This tablet is not like cheaper Android tablets I've used in the past. I'm not using many of the default Lenovo apps as I need the tablet for other things. Everything is working, the tablet had no trouble with the over the air upgrade to the latest version of Android. Right now the last thing I'm looking for is a nice tablet pen and I may actual be able to replace my paper and pen notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but Wifi pick up could be better
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents, the previous tablet was a failure so i needed something that was easy to use and adapt to , and overall this is (they are not tech friendly so they still struggle a bit but have taken to this very well) Wish it had a sim card facility as well positives - great display - good sound, - easy interface - fast negatives - Wifi strength is not very good, they get better clarity on skype using the their MotoG than this at the same location? why is that?
customer_reviews.author: Vishal

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our first tablet. Didn't want iPad price, and we were familiar with the Android operating system and store. Love it!! Will probably buy another. No need even to look at iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: It's been great. It hasn't answered all my questions
customer_reviews.text: It's been great. It hasn't answered all my questions , nor solved all my problems. I am slowly learning all the ins and outs. With time I could be extremely happy. It, but is sure would help if I had a little more help in finding solutions to utilizing the ins and outs. I would love to keep my current tablet as long as the upgrades keep me to be compatible with the best standards and capabilities of other tablets/computers. The cost was well within my means and I expect to keep my current for the next year or more.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Giberson

customer_reviews.title: the system is not perfect and you're bound to get defective merchandise every now ...
customer_reviews.text: Five stars all the way! I don't know why people complain, the system is not perfect and you're bound to get defective merchandise every now and then. even now I am dictating this review by using my lenova and this doing incredibly well with translating my words to text. this tablet is f****** awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shazaam1271

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for tablet my mom. It was very easy to set up. The speed of it is fantastic. The clarity of the screen is just as good as my iPad.For the price it is well worth it. I would highly recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sky

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet at a great price! It's a little on the heavy side, but the big screen shows videos (and games) very well, and in the four months I've had it, I haven't had any problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Because she's happy!
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are in the front and the functionality is well worth the money spent! My mother-in-law originally bought another brand of tablet that came with a keyboard. The keyboard had buttons that did not work. I returned it for her and used the money to buy her this. Now she's happy!
customer_reviews.author: B-Ray

customer_reviews.title: All I hoped for and then some
customer_reviews.text: Does everything that could be desired from a unit at even a higher price point. Very high resolution. I added a 16 GB SD card and gives plenty of storage. I now use my laptops for complicated work only.
customer_reviews.author: Olathe Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect screen size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to use and she loves it. She uses a Nook for e-reading and needed something larger for email and internet use. The 10 inch screen was just what she needed. Great wifi connections - no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: greasyregs

customer_reviews.title: it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with only a few minor issues. Sometimes it will close out a window that you are using, mostly for internet browsing, for no reason. Other than that little issue, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Boomslang1982

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet to the money
customer_reviews.text: Our fourth Lenovo tablet, and they just keep getting better. This 10" has a crystal clear screen and is very lightweight. Has all the great Android features we've come to expect. Hard to beat for $170.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Anderau

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet(especially for the price)
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. Build quality seems very good so far. Vibrant screen and very fast. Purchased this for my father who is 82 and he loves it. I am impressed enough at this point to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hd quality for watching films. Good battery life. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Hemsy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Thin. Easy to hold. Lightweight. Screen is very vivid and clear. Camera is mediocre. For a low-end tablet this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Kee

customer_reviews.title: They should put i little bit more of RAM on ...
customer_reviews.text: They should put i little bit more of RAM on it, but it is ok it supplies my necessities, however if you want a tablet to play games in a big screen this is not one of those and i don't know why, but it can't run TwitchTV, because it is missing an app, which is not compatible with it
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ootani

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality from a pricepoint perspective
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I find however that the high def lacks sufficient clarity. I have to play around with it a little (haven't had the time) and if I find differently I will update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give it 5 stars, for suse 4.65, nothing is perfect. I have a Samsung galaxy TAB 4 WITH A 10.1 inch screen. I paid 130.00 more for this Samsung. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This turned out to be a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and the recipent just loves it. Uses it all the time. It was easy to set up and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: A1 product. Great tablet, fast and the quality of the screen is very good. I bought this for a family member and I am thinking to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Boba

customer_reviews.title: The tablet works fine. The setup is easily and it updates itself ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet works fine. The setup is easily and it updates itself without any problem. The size and wight are ok, and I really like the 2 frontal speakers to hear some music while cooking. It's not the latest hardware, but for web, stream video/music and common apps, it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: ajs

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good substitute for people that need something if their computer breaks down. or in addition to one. just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: P. enner

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet for my son. Cost quite a bit less than the iPad and he uses it daily. Nice, clear display, lots of apps. I have an android phone, so he's had no issues adapting to android.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Polk

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Wanting to try Lenovo for a laptop so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Mom. Works fine. Wanting to try Lenovo for a laptop so this was a good starting choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ishna D.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 88-year-old mom!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my 88-year-old mother who has never touched a computer before. She is doing great and is enjoying having e-mail and Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. It is reasonably priced, has an excellent screen and is all round a winner.
customer_reviews.author: vrystaat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good Tablet, Works very well, WiFi is great, screen resolution is very good.
customer_reviews.author: SG-NY

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginners Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet for general use nothing to intensive. Just not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted with a good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, easy to use. Very good screen with bright deep colors.
customer_reviews.author: Benson C. Look

customer_reviews.title: vague on apps included
customer_reviews.text: said it came with gps but now app is expired. thought it was fully licensed
customer_reviews.author: debora

customer_reviews.title: ... of $170 for a lenovo 10 inch tablet with excellent speakers and audio and a solid feel
customer_reviews.text: At the price of $170 for a lenovo 10 inch tablet with excellent speakers and audio and a solid feel, there are no complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: For the money you couldn't get a better tablet. I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the money you couldn't get a better tablet.I am very happy with my purchase! It serves me well! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Eichhorst

customer_reviews.title: Fast and smart tablet, just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fast and smart tablet, just what I wanted. Great sound, decent screen resolution and efficient browsing. A bit heavier than I expected but still easy to hold & operate. Nothing complicated about it. Good couch companion for listening to music, seeing documentaries and keeping up with the news.
customer_reviews.author: Subhash Agrawal

customer_reviews.title: Solid build quality and decent performance
customer_reviews.text: The A10 has a solid build given the price tag and it suffices for general usage but lags slightly while playing games. Overall, exceeds expectations for the amount paid.
customer_reviews.author: Loh Hao Jie

customer_reviews.title: Great as ususl. luv lenovo
customer_reviews.text: I loved lenovo. A little heavy but more than gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: kitty leigh

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The picture, color, and size is just as good as any iPad. And the price you can't beat.
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLET FOR PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Fast reliable unit. More than pleased. Quad core does the trick. Wireless connection very good. Not at all disappointed,
customer_reviews.author: adamgosp

customer_reviews.title: Great product, we love it
customer_reviews.text: Lowest price. Great product, we love it, and would not hesitate to buy another
customer_reviews.author: jove

customer_reviews.title: A very good product. Shipped and arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. Shipped and arrived very quickly. Very pleased. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Anders

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Returns, A++
customer_reviews.text: This review is for Amazon's return team only. The tablet Loked good out of the box, but died in a week. It went to Lenovo's repair center in Texas, and while it was gone I decided I didn't to chance it breaking down again. By the time it came back, it was past the 30-day return date, but Amazon took it back anyway. My gratitude to them.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is in perfect condition, and is working perfectly like brand new. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this tablet Lenovo will not cover warranty because it comes with a 3rd party usb charger.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Louks

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is just perfect. Best tablet for the price for sure
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is just perfect. Best tablet for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Kruse

customer_reviews.title: based on reviews and cost I definitely wanted a 10 inch tablet this was the best buy when in to Fry's to get it but ...
customer_reviews.text: Stoked on purchase, got this for a birthday gift from my mom but I was able to pick it out. based on reviews and cost I definitely wanted a 10 inch tablet this was the best buy when in to Fry's to get it but they were out cuz it was so popular so ordered offline on Amazon only a few times has it froze but that fix itself out within a few. it's fast fun and affordableit's fast fun and affordable didn't realize that it would be more like a mobile phone than an actual computer though all websites go to mobile sites
customer_reviews.author: ❄ Luvsnow

customer_reviews.title: performing well - an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: "Upgraded" from a (more expensive) 7" Galaxy Tab 2 to this - so far, performing well - an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Swamp

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for the money. As other reviews have noted the camera is less than perfect but functionally OK. UPDATE 6/8/2015 I have owned this tablet for 9 months. It will not restart. I have tried every troubleshooting technique outlined in the user manual, multiple times, without success. I have tried customer service through both Amazon and lenovo, no joy. Avoid this junk.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo is a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: We love our Lenovo. I does all we need and more. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: cactusgal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good decent tablet, great quality audio... But stuck on Android 4.4.2... Not upgradeable.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet. Resolution is not as good as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet. Resolution is not as good as my samsung Galaxy but it is good enough for the price, it works very fast with the internet, nice big screen. It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Belkis and Enzo

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and function.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Camera MP's are higher than most.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet. Definitely worth the money. Looks good, watching movies and great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: ACHIUDE BENDET

customer_reviews.title: A very nice tablet, even considering the low price
customer_reviews.text: When not used for Android development projects, my teenagers readily steal it. That has not been the case for some of my other tablets. A very nice tablet, even considering the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: freezes more often than i would like, but all in all, it's ok..... not crazy about it though
customer_reviews.author: rodrigo sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Best bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. best option for the price. Pros- Price point Nice display Good overall design 10 Inch Display Cons- Touch interface is not as good as other high end products Not impressed with Camera
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin

customer_reviews.title: good for all practical purpose of personal use
customer_reviews.text: good for all practical purpose of personal use.. too happy to have it and gifted it to my family as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet ...very responsive, great sound for a tablet, good color and clearity for 720p screen ( not like my nexus 7 2013, but look at the price) This tablet is a much better performer than the galaxy tab I traded in! (the tab was constantly hanging and slow) Build quality is great...don't buy if you are looking to use the camera much for important photos.
customer_reviews.author: B. S. R.

customer_reviews.title: No Zoom or Comment Viewing on Youtube
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture. Nice sound. Touchscreen is very sluggish. On youtube, I was not able to use the touchscreen to get a full screen or to bring up comments. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: schanteuse1

customer_reviews.title: this tablet is tops, everything i expected. well ...
customer_reviews.text: this tablet is tops ,everything i expected. well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: bigdaddy55

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for product or vendor. Don't waste your time. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this tablet. My expectations were low. I only needed it for reading work related PDF files, however, one speaker was dead on arrival and the battery would not charge. I did load a subscription video watching service and found the graphics lagging. Audio did not quite match the video. I knew this wasn't going to be the state of the art tablet going so I probably would have kept it were it not for the other glaring defects.
customer_reviews.author: Poetic Justice

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: used it 2 days and returned it. A piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lasher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my niece and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mendoza

product_meta.title: Lenovo IdeaTab A10-70 10-Inch 16 GB Tablet
product_meta.description:
Your leisure time will never be the same with the Lenovo TAB A10's blend of performance and features. The 10.1-inch wide-view HD display gives you lots of viewing space for your movies and videos, while the Dolby-enhanced dual front speakers make your entertainment pop. The quad-core CPU and long battery life keep you going longer and stronger in the office, at home or on the road.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 16 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars177 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
